title: Battery Clamp 400A Red and Black Pr S/Steel
blurb:
Rated at 400 amps this pair of heavy duty battery clamps are ideal for making up jumper leads and for use with our inverters. All metal parts are made from 316 marine grade stainless steel, they can be taken and used anywhere without the risk of corrosion.
> Sold per pair
> Current rating: 400 amps
> Length 165mm
> Max jaw opening 50mm
> 316 Grade (marine grade) stainless steel
